mapper.sql: id, parent_id, name, perms, path, icon, remark, type, no, create_time, create_user, modify_time, modify_user, del_time, del_user, isdel
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT perms FROM( SELECT m.perms FROM sys_role_tbl r LEFT JOIN sys_user_role_tbl ur ON ur.role_id =r.id LEFT JOIN sys_user_tbl u ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_component_tbl rm ON rm.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN sys_component_tbl m ON m.id = rm.com_id WHERE COALESCE(m.perms,'')!='' AND ur.isdel=0 AND rm.isdel=0 AND m.isdel=0 AND u.username = #{userName} UNION ALL SELECT m.perms FROM sys_user_tbl u LEFT JOIN sys_user_component_tbl uc ON uc.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN sys_component_tbl m ON m.id = uc.com_id WHERE COALESCE(m.perms,'')!='' AND uc.isdel=0 AND m.isdel=0 AND u.username = #{userName}) a
